republican.translation[0].definitions[0]: someone who believes in government by elected representatives only, with no king or queen
republican.translation[1].definitions[0]: a member or supporter of the Republican Party in the US
republican.translation[2].definitions[0]: someone from Northern Ireland who believes that Northern Ireland should become part of the Republic of Ireland, not the United Kingdom
republican.translation[3].definitions[0]: relating to or supporting a system of government that is not led by a king or queen
